properties.name: --color
properties.description: Sets the color of the divider.

properties.name: --inset
properties.description: Shrinks the divider by the given amount from the start. If `middle` is set it will shrink from both sides.

properties.name: --column-count
properties.description: The number of columns for the tile manager. The `column-count` attribute sets this variable.

properties.name: --min-col-width
properties.description: The minimum size of the columns in the tile-manager. The `min-column-width` attribute sets this variable.

properties.name: --min-row-height
properties.description: The minimum size of the rows in the tile-manager. The `min-row-height` attribute sets this variable.

properties.name: --grid-gap
properties.description: The gap size of the underlying CSS grid container. The `gap` attributes sts this variable.

properties.name: --symbol-full-color
properties.description: The color of the filled symbol.

properties.name: --symbol-empty-color
properties.description: The color of the empty symbol.

properties.name: --symbol-full-filter
properties.description: The filter(s) used for the filled symbol.

properties.name: --symbol-empty-filter
properties.description: The filter(s) used for the empty symbol.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(invalid)

pseudoElements.description: Indicates that the title should be above the indicator. Applies to `header-container`.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(bottom)
pseudoElements.description: Indicates that the title should be below the indicator. Applies to `header-container`.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(start)
pseudoElements.description: Indicates that the title should be before the indicator. Applies to `header-container`.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(end)
pseudoElements.description: Indicates that the title should be after the indicator. Applies to `header-container`.
